pullRequest.title: Improve ServerGUI
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes:

Added TPS entry under average ms
Added paper logo as frame icon
Small code tweaks

I think i want to fix a small issue here too, but im not sure where its caused:

May someone help me there?
Note:
I already had one PR open, but i somehow managed to push the server folder to github instead of the root project. lmao sorry
Connects-to: #4599

nodes.bodyText:
The TPS should be the same as with /tps; the last 5s isn't always the best metric.
Also use an obfhelper to access this.d.
No need changing the constant, I can't see why we'd want a conflict on it if it ever changes.
No need changing the constant, I can't see why we'd want a conflict on it if it ever changes.
Did you check if this was the cause to your issue?
The name is in no way conveyed to the user (afaik?), so this is unnecessary.
No need changing the constant, I can't see why we'd want a conflict on it if it ever changes.
No need changing the constant, I can't see why we'd want a conflict on it if it ever changes.

nodes.bodyText: You don't need reflection nor sun pkg stuff here. Did you not look at the stackoverflow answer I linked?

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,453 @@
+From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: AlexProgrammerDE <40795980+AlexProgrammerDE@users.noreply.github.com>
+Date: Sat, 3 Oct 2020 08:27:40 +0200
+Subject: [PATCH] Improve ServerGUI
+
+- Added logo to server frame
+- Show tps in the server stats
+- Fix title issue on gnome
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/com/destroystokyo/paper/gui/RAMDetails.java b/src/main/java/com/destroystokyo/paper/gui/RAMDetails.java
+index e463a86a6ad6c4f2885f4df159411bad294e1208..50960535a64efaf9dfb9bb95ea765b6c19616b6f 100644
+--- a/src/main/java/com/destroystokyo/paper/gui/RAMDetails.java
++++ b/src/main/java/com/destroystokyo/paper/gui/RAMDetails.java
+@@ -2,8 +2,6 @@ package com.destroystokyo.paper.gui;
+ 
+ import net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer;
+ import net.minecraft.server.SystemUtils;
+-import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
